body_html:
Following @gunan 's guide step by step to build protobuf-3.0.2-cp34-cp34m-macosx_10_10_x86_64.whl wheel package locally on my Mac, and it works like a charm!

Thank you guys!

$ pip install protobuf-3.0.2-cp34-cp34m-macosx_10_10_x86_64.whl 
Processing ./protobuf-3.0.2-cp34-cp34m-macosx_10_10_x86_64.whl
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): six>=1.9 in /Users/ye/.envs/ai/lib/python3.4/site-packages (from protobuf==3.0.2)
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): setuptools in /Users/ye/.envs/ai/lib/python3.4/site-packages (from protobuf==3.0.2)
Installing collected packages: protobuf
Successfully installed protobuf-3.0.2

$ pip freeze | grep protobuf
protobuf==3.0.2

$ python -c "from google.protobuf.internal import api_implementation; print(api_implementation._default_implementation_type)"
cpp

body:
Following @gunan 's guide step by step to build `protobuf-3.0.2-cp34-cp34m-macosx_10_10_x86_64.whl` wheel package locally on my Mac, and it works like a charm!

Thank you guys!

``` bash
$ pip install protobuf-3.0.2-cp34-cp34m-macosx_10_10_x86_64.whl 
Processing ./protobuf-3.0.2-cp34-cp34m-macosx_10_10_x86_64.whl
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): six>=1.9 in /Users/ye/.envs/ai/lib/python3.4/site-packages (from protobuf==3.0.2)
Requirement already satisfied (use --upgrade to upgrade): setuptools in /Users/ye/.envs/ai/lib/python3.4/site-packages (from protobuf==3.0.2)
Installing collected packages: protobuf
Successfully installed protobuf-3.0.2

$ pip freeze | grep protobuf
protobuf==3.0.2

$ python -c "from google.protobuf.internal import api_implementation; print(api_implementation._default_implementation_type)"
cpp
```
